title: Replace app logo everywhere with uploaded image (resized)

requirements.text: Create resized logo asset set from the uploaded image "Tech Repair Logo with Blue and Gray.png" for use across the app (UI logo, favicon, and social preview), ensuring the logo is centered, not distorted, and has appropriate padding so it renders well at small sizes.

quotes: I want to change the logo for the app
yu should resize it for the app

acceptanceCriteria: New logo image files exist under frontend/public/assets/generated with the filenames specified in imageRequirements.required.
All generated logo assets are square where applicable, visually centered, and do not appear stretched.
Small-size assets (16x16, 32x32) remain recognizable with simplified/clean edges (no accidental cropping).

requirements.text: Replace the current in-app logo usage (currently using "/assets/generated/controller-logo.dim_512x512.png") with the new generated logo asset everywhere it appears in the UI (at minimum: SiteHeader and LandingPage hero).

quotes: I want to change the logo for the app

acceptanceCriteria: Header logo displays the new logo on desktop and mobile header states.
Landing page hero logo displays the new logo.
No remaining references to "/assets/generated/controller-logo.dim_512x512.png" are used for the brand logo in the header/hero after the update.

requirements.text: Update the HTML head to use the new logo assets for browser/favicon and add an Open Graph social preview image using the generated social preview asset.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html includes favicon link tags pointing to the generated 16x16 and 32x32 assets.
frontend/index.html includes an apple-touch-icon link pointing to the generated 180x180 asset.
frontend/index.html includes Open Graph image metadata referencing the generated 1200x630 asset.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Keep all backend logic unchanged (logo update is frontend/static-asset only).
Store generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (do not serve images through the backend).
nonGoals: Changing the app name, subtitle, or other copy.
Redesigning the app UI beyond what is necessary to display the updated logo.
Adding new authentication methods or any backend schema/state changes.

required: Square brand logo with transparent background, centered with comfortable padding (kslab-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Square favicon, simplified and centered, transparent background (kslab-favicon.dim_32x32.png)
Square favicon, simplified and centered, transparent background (kslab-favicon.dim_16x16.png)
Apple touch icon, centered with padding (kslab-apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
Social preview image on a clean light background, logo centered and prominent (kslab-og-image.dim_1200x630.png)
